task_description:
# Build Team Members Directory

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-72](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-72/build-team-members-directory)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog

## Description

Member cards with roles - Ref: 19-team-members.png

patterns.routing: React Router with Routes in src/App.tsx, page components in src/pages/
patterns.api_client: Uses axios via lib/api/client.ts with apiClient, handles auth tokens automatically
patterns.card_components: MUI Card + styled() API from @mui/material/styles, hover effects with transform
patterns.page_structure: Fetch data with useState/useEffect, handle loading/error states, responsive grid layouts
patterns.navigation: Sidebar component with mainNavItems array for top-level routes

existing_implementations.description: TeamCard component exists showing team workload with member cards. TeamMember interface defined with user, role, workloadPercent fields. Backend API /team-members already returns team member data.
existing_implementations.data_structure: TeamMember interface with id, userId, user (User), role (UserRole), teamName, availableHours, assignedHours, workloadPercent
